EICAR_Test_File.name: EICAR Test File
EICAR_Test_File.description: This is a test file to verify the functionality of antivirus software.

Trojan.Generic.name: Generic Trojan
Trojan.Generic.description: A generic detection for a Trojan horse. It might be used to download additional malicious files, steal information, or perform other malicious actions.

Ransomware.Locky.name: Locky Ransomware
Ransomware.Locky.description: A type of ransomware that encrypts files and demands a ransom to unlock them.

Spyware.Keylogger.name: Keylogger Spyware
Spyware.Keylogger.description: A type of spyware that records keystrokes to capture sensitive information such as passwords and credit card numbers.

Adware.Generic.name: Generic Adware
Adware.Generic.description: A generic detection for adware, which displays unwanted advertisements to the user.

Worm.AutoRun.name: AutoRun Worm
Worm.AutoRun.description: A worm that spreads via removable drives by creating an autorun.inf file.

Virus.Macro.name: Macro Virus
Virus.Macro.description: A type of virus that uses macros to infect documents and spreadsheets.
